title: FC Versailles 78 - Wikipedia
snippet: The club is an official academy of the French Football Federation. Since 2024, the club has been partially owned by French Formula One driver Pierre Gasly. FC Versailles was formed in 1989 as the result of a merger between Racing Club Versailles and Companion Sports Versailles.

title: FC Versailles 78
snippet: FC Versailles 78 is a French semi-professional football club based in Versailles, in the Yvelines department (department 78), that currently competes in the Championnat National, the third tier of the French football league system.[1][2] Formed in 1989 through the merger of Racing Club de Versailles and Compagnons Sportifs de Versailles, the club adopted the name Football Club de Versailles 78 and has since risen through the regional and national divisions, achieving promotion to the Championnat National in 2023 after winning the Championnat National 2 title.[3][4] The club's home matches are

title: Formula 1 driver Pierre Gasly becomes French football club's co-owner
snippet: Formula 1 driver Pierre Gasly has become co-owner of FC Versailles, a semi-professional French football club based near Paris.
